resources:
AiohTeaCollection Setup device... Button ADD SWITCH
Enter ID and Description of switch that was attached to network, press ADD SWITCH button to add the switch to your device collection.
Switch Description Switch Name About... 1. Press (+) button to add your devices\n2. Tap an added device to control HELP Short guidance:
SWITCH STATUS</!--> "STATUS: ON" "STATUS: OFF" "STATUS: OFFLINE" "Tap to find the switch"
SWITCH SETUP</!-->
\u0020+ Switch name: an easy to remember name\n + WiFi SSID: WiFi name that the switch will connect to\n + WiFi password: WiFi password
SETUP SWITCH WiFi SSID WiFi password
